news.title: NATO Secretary General Stoltenberg Set to Head Munich Security Conference
news.description: NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg will become the first non-German to lead the Munich Security Conference.

news.title: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz Calls for Swift Peace in Ukraine
news.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz emphasized the need for renewed diplomatic efforts to end the war in Ukraine.

news.title: Germany’s Political Landscape Becomes More Fractured
news.description: The successes of the AfD and BSW in state elections are reshaping the German political system.

news.title: Young Women and Girls at Higher Risk of Homelessness in Germany
news.description: Homelessness rates are rising among young women and girls in Germany, drawing attention to social inequalities.

news.title: Volkswagen’s Economic Troubles and What It Means for Germany
news.description: Job cuts and plant closures at Volkswagen signal broader challenges for Germany’s economy.

news.title: Cross-Party Migration Talks in Germany Break Down
news.description: Migration policy talks collapse as the opposition CDU/CSU refuses further meetings.

news.title: Berlin Plans New Refugee Accommodation as Centers Fill Up
news.description: Berlin authorities are searching for new solutions to accommodate the rising number of refugees.

news.title: Secret House Searches for Terrorism Suspects? German Police Want New Powers
news.description: Germany’s Federal Criminal Police Office proposes secret home searches to fight terrorism.

news.title: Germany's Need for Immigrants Stressed by Chancellor Olaf Scholz
news.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz underlines the country’s reliance on immigrants during talks in the Bundestag.

news.title: Populist Parties Pressure German Support for Ukraine
news.description: Far-right parties like the AfD and BSW challenge Germany’s continued support for Ukraine.
